Project.Brief history of your project and organi: ChronoCore is a data-focused team committed to preserving, managing, and sharing high-value datasets. We work on indexing, storing, and enabling open access to scientific and benchmark datasets. As part of our mission, we leverage decentralized storage solutions like Filecoin to ensure data durability and global accessibility.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset is produced and maintained by the Linked Data Benchmark Council (LDBC). It is a synthetic graph benchmark dataset, commonly known as the Social Network Benchmark (SNB) suite. SNB simulates the structure and operations of a social network, including user profiles, friendships, posts, comments, likes, and transactional behavior. It supports two workloads: the Interactive workload (for transactional graph queries) and the Business Intelligence (BI) workload (for analytical queries).
